subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brian Gay shot a four-under-par 67 in the third round Saturday to take a three-shot lead over Tim Wilkinson at the Verizon Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C. Gay, who has one career PGA Tour victory, has made only one bogey at Harbour Town Golf Links. Wilkinson, a left-hander from New Zealand seeking his first PGA victory, shot a 65. Lee Janzen, who has not won on the tour since 1998, shot a 69 that kept him in third, four shots behind.
